history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the BLUE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to go?
USER the waterfront
TTS Okay, going to the waterfront. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER the airport
TTS Okay, leaving from pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER 5:00
TTS Okay, travelling at 05:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 50 minutes, and you will take 2 busses..
Take the 28X ,to Blvd of Allies at Duquesne Univ Footbridge. It will depart at 5:40pm..
Walk for about 2 mins to Second avenue at south 10th St Bridge..
Take the 53L ,to Target Dr at Target Perimeter Rd. It will depart at 6:53pm..
Walk for about 2 mins to 149 West Bridge St, Homestead, PA 15120, USA..
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Would you use GetGoing again? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
